item.title: 【HD Live Performances】HDTV - Stereophonics - BBC Radio Two in the Park 2025 HDTV 720p AAC
item.description:
Losslessly cut from the bbc iplayer stream of this festival.

If the 1080p version appears on iPlayer i'll upload that too (though the bitrate is the same so the quality will be almost identical). That version may include more of the sets.

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Sheena Easton Single / Album (Qobuz 16bits / 44.1khz)
item.description:
hi

I'd be very grateful if someone could upload a sheena easton single and album from Qobuz

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/anything-can-happen-sheena-easton/rhmx29yxksdva

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/the-definitive-12-singles-1983-1987-sheena-easton/ctlhzxywa7ora

thanks
